definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Nu 5:27 thigh, loin, side, base (NH id.; Aram. [[יַרְכָּא]]; Zinj. [[ירך]] loin; As. arku, arkâtu, back, rear, hereafter Dl:HWB 242; Ar. warika hip)—abs. [[יׇרֵךְ]] Ju Jdg 15:8 + 6 t.; cstr. [[יֶ֫רֶךְ]] Ge 24:9 + 11 t. + 2Sa 3:27 (v. infr.); sf. [[יְרֵכִי]] Ge 24:2, Ge 47:29; [[יְרֵכֵח]] Nu 5:21; [[יְרֵכוֹ]] Ge 32:26 + 6 t.; [[יְרֵכָהּ]] Ex 25:31+ 3 t.; du. [[יְרֵכַיִם]] Ex 28:42; sf. [[יְרֵכַיִח]] Ct So 7:2; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: outside of thigh, where sword was worn, [[שִׂים חֶרֶב עַל־יְרֵכוֹ]] Ex 32:27 (E); [[וַיַחְגּׁר אׂתָהּ עַל־יֶרֶח]] [[יְמִינוֹ]] Ju Jdg 3:16 and he girded it upon his right thigh, v:Jdg 3:21, Ps 45:4, Ct So 3:8; [[כַּף הַיׇּרֵח]] Ge 32:33 hollow of the thigh, v:Ge 32:26, v:Ge 32:26, v:Ge 32:32 (all J); [[חַמּוּקֵי יְרֵכַיִח]] Ct So 7:2 the roundings of thy thighs; [[מִמָּתְנַיִם וְעַד־יְרֵכַיִם]] Ex 28:42 (P); ‖[[בֶּטֶן]] Nu 5:21, Nu 5:22, Nu 5:27 (P); [[חׂלֵעַ עַל־יְרֵכוֹ]] Ge 32:32 (J), limping upon his thigh; [[סָפַק עַל־יׇרֵח]] Je 31:19 and (c. [[אֶל־]]) Ez Eze 21:17, smite upon, thigh, in token of consternation; [[וַיַּח אוֹחָם שׁוֹק עַל־]] [[יׇרֵךְ]] Ju Jdg 15:8 and he smote them, hip upon thigh, a great slaughter.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: thigh = loins, as seat of procreative power (RS:K. 34; Sem. i, 360 (380)) [[יׁחְאֵי ירך]] those proceeding from the loins of any one Ge 46:26, Ex 1:5 (both P), Ju Jdg 8:30; hence [[שִׂים יַד תַּחַת]] [[ירך]] place the hand under thigh, in taking oath Ge 24:2, Ge 24:9 (J), Ge 47:29.
side (flank) of altar 2Ki 16:14, Le 1:11 (P); of tabernacle Ex 40:22, Ex 40:24, Nu 3:29, Nu 3:35 (all P); also [[יֶרֶךְ הַשַּׁעַר]] (for MT ´[[תּוֹח הַשּׁ]]) LXX Th We Dr Bu Kit.
base (loins) of candlestick Ex 25:31, Ex 37:17, Nu 8:4 (all P).
